column4: guys...can any one help me...i am a newbie to linux...i installed 6.06 ubuntu...i added all the repositories...after installing them i restarted my system...after log-in with my user-name i cannot do the many operations...its saying "you do not have premission !!!!" ...but before installing the updates i was able to do all the operation......
you need to run "sudo" before any system command
